channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell EMC -- iDRAC6 (Monolithic)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell EMC -- iDRAC6 (Monolithic)

item.title: CVE-2018-1212|2024-09-17T01:37:02.877Z -- dell%20emc -- idrac6%20%28monolithic%29
item.description: The web-based diagnostics console in Dell EMC iDRAC6 (Monolithic versions prior to 2.91 and Modular all versions) contains a command injection vulnerability. A remote authenticated malicious iDRAC user with access to the diagnostics console could potentially exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands as root on the affected iDRAC system.
